CustomField.inlineHelpText:
NYS = New York State.
For the definition of Priority Population and Disadvantaged Communities, including an interactive map of Disadvantaged Communities, see the "Definitions" page of the NYSERDA Workforce Development website: https://www.nyserda.ny.gov/All-Programs/Programs/Clean-Energy-Workforce-Development/Definitions
